channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

Damage to pavement outside primary school gates. Tarmac broken up over fairly large area.

item.title: Give way markings have completely worn away, 15th November
item.description:
The give way markings from the Stoke Road entry onto the roundabout at Cleeve Bypass in Bishops Cleeve have completely worn away and no longer exist.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Orchard Road, Bishop's Cleeve

item.category: General road marking and stud issues

item.title: Light is not working, 15th November
item.description:
In front of my house 2 Baltimore court , I would like it to stay on all the time please . It is never on !!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Baltimore Court, Brockworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: 50mt x 1mt, 15th November
item.description:
The Road not reinstated after new surface being laid. After meany requests for it to be done quoting RT Act under section 41

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Gretton Road, Gotherington, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged road surface causing house vibrations and internal house damage from traffic, 15th November
item.description:
Near the bus stop on Gloucester Road (near to house numbers 187 and 185 Gloucester Road), the road is in a very poor state of repair. Heavy traffic travelling along the road on the surface causes our house to seriously vibrate. We have had pictures and mirrors fall off walls, doors shake and damage internally.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 211, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road marking and stud issues

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Montpellier Parade, Montpellier, Cheltenham

item.title: The water running down north road west is getting worse., 15th November
item.description:
The water running out of Aldi is getting worse. It is breaking up the tarmac. But more of an issue is when it gets cold next week and it freezes. It will be accidents waiting to happen as it is not a road that's gritted. With the road closed at the bamfurlong junction, north road west is being used more. PLEASE do something with this road. Please do not close without actually doing something.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, North Road West, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Dangerous raised paving slap (not the only one). Trip hazard and have tripped and fallen. If an elderly person was to do this they’d quite likely sustain a broken bone. This is not acceptable and the same issue has been reported previously!, 15th November
item.description:
Right side pavement if approaching the roundabout on prestbury road going towards town. Dangerous raised paving slap (not the only one). Trip hazard and have tripped and fallen. If an elderly person was to do this they’d quite likely sustain a broken bone. This is not acceptable and the same issue has been reported previously!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Prestbury Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface problem, 15th November
item.description:
Customer reports that following patching works on the carriageway, cracks have appeared in the pavement O/S the location; they believe these may be as the result of the equipment being used. As the team are still in the area, they ask if they could return and fill this with tarmac today.
Report on FixMyStreet
